DOC.brief_title: Development Rational Ways Medical Non-medical Treatment Methods Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To create complex scientifically prove concept Metabolic syndrome ( МS ) development base elaboration new method clinical diagnostics МS component highly effective МS clinical management comparative study clinical , laboratory cost effectiveness . Participants method : This clinical study include 351 adult ( 184 female ) Scientific research institute cardiology internal disease ( Almaty , Republic Kazakhstan ) . Statistical analysis perform use Microsoft Excel-2008 update Lapach , Chubenko et al ( 2000 ) SPSS Windows v.17.0 .
DOC.criteria: write consent form age > 25 year skinfold thickness > 0,7 cm BP > 130/85 mm Hg patient antihypertensive medication fast blood glucose > 6.1 mmole/L , 2hour postprandial glucose level > 11.1 mmole/L / patient type 2 diabetes blood cholesterol > 5.6 mmole/L possibility treatment > 6 month followup > 1 year complete immobilization patient ( paresis /paralysis ) patient severe concomitant disease kidney ( ) liver early postoperative condition mental illness pregnancy person prison person military Armed Forces
